entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:16 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Fog, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 08:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
Condition: Fog
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 2.3°C
Wind: NE 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle early this morning. Rain at times heavy mixed with drizzle beginning this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Temperature steady near plus 4. POP 60%

entry.title: Wednesday: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
